name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime (Tensura - Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken) Style LoRA
description:
Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️, feel free to buy me a coffee ☕ or just leave a ❤️

Nice anime with a wide range of character designs. As a style LoRA this can get pretty close to original characters from their description, but requires embedding or character LoRA of your fav to get accurate. Should be super flexible as it was trained on over 1700 screenshots from the anime.

Usage be pretty straightforward to use like all my recent ones. Just use AnyLoRA as base model, weight 1 and tensura as trigger. Please enjoy!

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
tags: that time i got reincarnated as a slime
